PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The weight - average molecular weight ( M w ) , number - average molecular weight ( M n ) , and polydispersity index ( PDI ) of P1- P7 were measured by SEC with o-dichlorobenzene as an eluent at 80 ° C. The characteristics of the polymers are summarized in Table 1.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| weight - average molecular weight (Mw) |
| number - average molecular weight (Mn) |
| polydispersity index (PDI) |
| 80 ° C |

The paragraph mentions several properties and values related to the polymers P1-P7. These properties and values are:

* The weight-average molecular weight (Mw) of P1-P7, which is a measure of the average molecular weight of the polymer chains, taking into account the weight of each chain.
* The number-average molecular weight (Mn) of P1-P7, which is a measure of the average molecular weight of the polymer chains, taking into account the number of each chain.
* The polydispersity index (PDI) of P1-P7, which is a measure of the distribution of molecular weights in a polymer sample.
* The temperature of 80 ° C, at which the measurements were taken.

These entities are presented in the table as they appear in the original paragraph, with the same spelling and formatting.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| weight - average molecular weight (Mw) |
| number - average molecular weight (Mn) |
| polydispersity index (PDI) |
